author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...MELISSA BRINGING DAMAGING WINDS, FLOODING RAINS, AND DANGEROUS STORM SURGE AS IT MOVES OVER EASTERN CUBA...
summary: ...MELISSA BRINGING DAMAGING WINDS, FLOODING RAINS, AND DANGEROUS STORM SURGE AS IT MOVES OVER EASTERN CUBA... As of 5:00 AM EDT Wed Oct 29 the center of Melissa was located near 20.3, -76.1 with movement NE at 12 mph. The minimum central pressure was 960 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 115 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Melissa (AT3/AL132025)
